entity.name: Prince Adewumi Adewale
entity.description: A digital strategist and developer creating intelligent, scalable solutions that merge technology and agriculture to drive growth in underserved and rural markets. My work, including TessyFarm Nexus, is built on a foundation of FOSS principles.

projects.name: TessyFarm Nexus
projects.description: An AI and blockchain-powered FOSS platform that provides data-driven efficiency, supply chain transparency, and critical insights to small-scale farmers. It serves as essential technological infrastructure for sustainable agriculture.

channels.description: Support the TessyFarm Nexus project through Open Collective, a transparent platform for FOSS funding.

plans.name: Server & Maintenance Fund
plans.description: Covers monthly cloud hosting, data storage, and server maintenance costs required for the platform's sustained operation. This is crucial for a stable user experience.

plans.name: Developer & Feature Grant
plans.description: A one-time grant to support key feature development, including real-time AI crop disease detection and local weather API integration. This will accelerate the platform's value and user adoption.
